person.persName: James H. Spradlin (Johnson County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamin Spradlin and Martha Spradlin. Married to Amanda Stafford Spradlin on December 30, 1852. Father of Benjamin Spradlin. Married to Jane Wheeler Spradlin on July 5, 1858. Father of Algermon Spradlin and Henrietta Spradlin. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Captain in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia (U.S.A.) from May 21, 1864 to June 21, 1864.
